'''Grey DeLisle''', born '''Erin Grey Van Oosbree''', is an American voice actress known for her roles in various animated series. Among others, she has voiced [https://fairlyoddparents.fandom.com/wiki/Vicky Vicky] from ''{{Wikipedia|The Fairly Odd Parents}}'', {{Wikipedia|Azula}} in {{Wikipedia|Avatar: The Last Airbender}}, {{Wikipedia|Daphne Blake}} in the ''{{Wikipedia|Scooby-Doo}}'' franchise, [https://clifford.fandom.com/wiki/Emily_Elizabeth_Howard Emily Elizabeth] in ''{{Wikipedia|Clifford the Big Red Dog (2000 TV series)|Clifford the Big Red Dog}}'', {{Wikipedia|Catwoman}} in the {{Wikipedia|Batman: Arkham}} series, and ''[[the Simpsons]]'' characters [https://simpsonswiki.com/wiki/Martin_Prince Martin Prince] and [https://simpsonswiki.com/wiki/Sherri_Mackleberry Sherri] & [https://simpsonswiki.com/wiki/Terri_Mackleberry Terri].

== In the ''Minecraft'' franchise ==
In 2015, Grey was cast as {{MCSM|Ellegaard the Redstone Engineer}} in {{MCSM}}.<ref>{{Citation|url=https://time.com/4057777/minecraft-story-mode-trailer-watch/|title=Watch the ''Minecraft: Story Mode'' Launch Trailer|author=Matt Peckham|website=TIME|date=October 1, 2015}}</ref><ref>{{Citation|url=https://www.vg247.com/minecraft-story-mode-trailer-episode-1|title=This Minecraft: Story Mode trailer introduces you to the The Order of the Stone|author=Stephany Nunneley-Jackson|website=VG247|date=October. 1, 2015}}</ref> A veteran of the {{MCSM|Order of the Stone}}, her role in the story can vary drastically based off the player's choices.

== Trivia ==
* One of her most notable roles, Azula, would later appear in the [[Marketplace]] map [[Avatar Legends|''Avatar Legends'']].
